value.title: Chip Mode Selector
value.description: 0 Configuration Mode, 1 Readout Triggered Mode, 2 Readout Continuous Mode

value.title: Clustering
value.description: 0 Disable Clustering, 1 Enable Clustering

value.title: Matrix Readout Speed
value.description: 0 10MHz, 1 20MHz readout speed

value.title: IB Serial Link Speed
value.description: 0 400mbit/s 1 600mbit/s 2,3 1200mbit/s

value.title: Enable Skewing of Global Signals
value.description: 0 Disable skewing of global signals to the matrix

value.title: Enable Skewing of Start Readout
value.description: 0 Disable skewing 1 Skewing enabled, Region Readout is started with 1 cycle delay, starting from regions 12-19 and going outwards in groups of 8 regions

value.title: Enable Readout Clock Gating
value.description: 0 Clock gating disabled, RRU and TRU modules have always the clock active, 1 Enables clock gating for the readout modules (RRU and TRU), clock to the modules is disabled when readout is in idle

value.title: Enable Readout From CMU
value.description: When enabled, data is not automatically sent off-chip, but remains in the internal memeory until manually read from registers 0x0012 and 0x0013

value.title: Pixel MEB Mask
value.description: 1 disable given event buffer (default 000 to enable all meb slices) Setting bit 0 masks Matrix Slice 1, bit1 masks slice 1 and bit 2 masks Slice 3. Masking all slices is ignored and equivalent to enabling all

value.title: Internal Strobe Generation
value.description: 0 disabled, 1 enable internal sequencer for generation of repetitive strobe pulse in readout mode

value.title: Enable BUSY Monitoring
value.description: 0 disabled, 1 FROMU will monitor external busy line, reject triggers when BUSY is asserted

value.title: Test Pulse Mode
value.description: 0 digital pulse to pixels, 1 set analog pulse as a test pulse

value.title: Enable Test STROBE
value.description: 1 enable automatic generation of a STROBe after a PULSE signal

value.title: Enable Rotate Pulse Lines
value.description: 1 enable automatic shift and rotate of selected pulse line after each PULSE Signal

value.title: Trigger Delay
value.description: Delay, in clock cycles, between the arrival of the trigger and the assertion of the STROBE
Set the duration of the STROBE signal from 25ns to 1638.4us (step 25ns)
Set the gap between suqsequent STROBE signal from 25ns to 1638.4us (step 25ns), Internal sequencer must be enabled
Set the delay from the test PULSE to the STROBE signal from 0 to 1638.4us (step 25ns)
Set the PULSE duration from 0 to 1638.4us (step 25ns)

address.title: DAC settings for DCLK and MCLIK I/O buffers
DAC settings for CMU I/O buffers

value.title: Initial Token
value.description: Must be set to 1 to the chip that has the token by default(normally should be the MASTER chip of the module)

value.title: PLL VCO Delay Stages control
value.description: control the number of delay stages used in the VCO. b00 VCO with 3 stages(slow case) b01 VCO with 4stages (typical case) b11 VCO with 5stages (fast case)

value.title: PLL Bandwidth Control
value.description: b0 selects wide bandwidth response, b1 selects a narrow bandwidth response

value.title: PLL off signal
value.description: b1 shuts down PLL

value.title: PLL Reset
value.description: Asynchronous reset of the PLL

value.title: High Speed line Driver current setting
Lock Wait Cycles
value.description: PLL monitoring state machine enters the PLL LOCKED state after sampling a continuous assertion of the PLL Lock flag for a number of clock cycles set with this trigger

value.title: Unlock Wait Cycles
value.description: The PLL monitoring state machine enters the PLL UNLOCKED state after sampling the PLL Lock flag continuously deasserted for a number of clock cycles set with this register

value.title: Test Enable
value.description: Activates the DTU test mode

value.title: Internal Pattern Enable
value.description: Selects between constant test patterns (1'b0) or test paterns generated by an internal pseudo-random pattern generator(1'b1)

value.title: Test Single Mode
value.description: Selects if encoding and line rate control circuits of the DTU Logic operate in single lane mode. This ibt is effective only while the DTU test mode is enabled

value.title: Prbs Rate
value.description: Control of the output bit rate when using the internal PRBS-7 pattern generator. b00:1200Mb/s b01:400Mb/s b10:600Mb/s b11: synchronous reset of the PRBS-7 pattern generator. Effective when pseudo-random pattern ggenerator enabled

value.title: BUSY Min Length
value.description: Set the minimum length of BUSY signal, in step of 25ns

address.title: Base 3 - Column Disable Register
address.description: Column Disable Register for selected region

value.title: PIXCNFG_REGSEL
value.description: Selction of the in-pixel register to be addressed 0 : MaskEnable register 1 : pulse register

value.title: PIXCNFG_DATA
value.description: Bit to be written in the target register

value.title: SWCNTL_DACMONI
value.description: 0 monitor 1 overriding

value.title: SWCNTL_DACMONV
value.description: 0 monitor 1 overriding

value.title: Discriminator Sign
value.description: Control of the polarity of the ADC comparator

value.title: Half LSB Trim
value.description: Fine Control of the offset of the DAC inside the ADC. Used for ADC calibration procedures
